Posts.Content: I tried it for a year and gave up due to severe joint pains, the first was thumb to wrist pain, and then every joint in my body, making it difficult to even get out of bed.  I then tried aromasin which was worse.  I am now on Tamoxifen and joints are much improved.
Posts.Title: side effects from Femara

Posts.Content: so are these available in health food stores?
